TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Help extends System.Object

summary.span: 封装 HTML 帮助 1.0 引擎。

span.span: Encapsulates the HTML Help 1.0 engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法创建的新实例类。You cannot create a new instance of the class. 若要为应用程序提供帮助，请调用静态和方法。To provide Help for an application, call the static and methods. 可以使用显示编译的帮助文件 (.chm) 或 HTML 帮助格式的 HTML 文件。You can use to show compiled Help files (.chm) or HTML files in the HTML Help format. 已编译的帮助文件提供的内容、 索引、 搜索功能和关键字链接在页中的表。Compiled Help files provide a table of contents, an index, search capability, and keyword links in pages. 快捷键仅在已编译帮助文件中。Shortcuts work only in compiled Help files. 可以通过使用 HTML Help Workshop 生成 HTML Help 1.x 文件。You can generate HTML Help 1.x files by using HTML Help Workshop. 有关 HTML 帮助的详细信息，请参阅"HTML Help Workshop"和其他 HTML 帮助主题的[Microsoft HTML Help](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178661)。For more information about HTML Help, see "HTML Help Workshop" and other HTML Help topics at [Microsoft HTML Help](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178661). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示包含可以用于与 Mspaint.chm 帮助文件进行交互的三个按钮的窗体。The following code example displays a form that contains three buttons that can be used to interact with the Mspaint.chm Help file. **显示帮助索引**按钮将显示**索引**帮助文件的选项卡。The **Show Help Index** button displays the **Index** tab for the Help file. **显示帮助**按钮显示的帮助文件基于值中所选内容**帮助导航器**列表。The **Show Help** button displays content in the Help file based on the value that is selected in the **Help Navigator** list. **显示关键字**按钮显示的基于关键字的帮助文件中指定的内容**关键字**文本框。The **Show Keyword** button displays content in the Help file based on the keyword that is specified in the **Keyword** text box. 例如，若要显示由索引值的椭圆帮助页，选择中的值**帮助导航器**下拉列表中，键入**椭圆**中**参数**文本框中，，然后单击**显示帮助**按钮。For example, to show the Ovals Help page by the index value, select the value in the **Help Navigator** drop-down list, type **ovals** in the **Parameter** text box, and then click the **Show Help** button. 若要显示由关键字"来使用画笔绘制"帮助主题，请键入**mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm**中**关键字**文本框中，，然后单击**显示关键字**按钮。To show the "To paint with a brush" Help topic by the keyword, type **mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm** in the **Keyword** text box, and then click the **Show Keyword** button. 该示例使用方法来显示不同的帮助选项卡和帮助主题和方法以显示帮助索引。The example uses the method to display the different Help tabs and Help topics, and the method to display the Help index. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CPP/helpsnippet.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CS/helpsnippet.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Help#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/VB/helpsnippet.vb#1)]

span.span: Displays the contents of a Help file.

param.span: 帮助文件的路径和名称。

summary.span: 显示指定 URL 处的帮助文件内容。

span.span: Displays the contents of the Help file at the specified URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `url`参数可以采用以下形式*C:\path\sample.chm*或 */folder/file.htm*。The `url` argument can be of the form *C:\path\sample.chm* or */folder/file.htm*. 路径的格式的信息，请参阅[文件在 Windows 系统上的路径格式](~/docs/standard/io/file-path-formats.md)。For information on the format of paths, see [File path formats on Windows systems](~/docs/standard/io/file-path-formats.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了方法。The following code example demonstrates the method. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为的按钮的窗体`Button1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a button named `Button1`. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 显示在指定 URL 处找到的有关特定关键字的帮助文件内容。

span.span: Displays the contents of the Help file found at the specified URL for a specific keyword.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `url`参数可以采用以下形式*C:\path\sample.chm*或 */folder/file.htm*。The `url` argument can be of the form *C:\path\sample.chm* or */folder/file.htm*. 路径的格式的信息，请参阅[文件在 Windows 系统上的路径格式](~/docs/standard/io/file-path-formats.md)。For information on the format of paths, see [File path formats on Windows systems](~/docs/standard/io/file-path-formats.md). 如果`keyword`是`null`，将显示的帮助文件的目录。If `keyword` is `null`, the table of contents for the Help file will be displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示具有可用于与 mspaint.chm 帮助文件进行交互的三个按钮的窗体。The following code example displays a form with three buttons that can be used to interact with the mspaint.chm Help file. **显示帮助索引**按钮将显示**索引**帮助文件的选项卡。The **Show Help Index** button displays the **Index** tab for the Help file. **显示帮助**按钮显示的帮助文件基于值中所选内容**帮助导航器**列表。The **Show Help** button displays content in the Help file based on the value that is selected in the **Help Navigator** list. **显示关键字**按钮显示的基于关键字的帮助文件中指定的内容**关键字**文本框。The **Show Keyword** button displays content in the Help file based on the keyword that is specified in the **Keyword** text box. 例如，若要显示由索引值的椭圆帮助页，选择中的值**帮助导航器**下拉列表中，键入**椭圆**中**参数**文本框中，，然后单击**显示帮助**按钮。For example, to show the Ovals Help page by the index value, select the value in the **Help Navigator** drop-down list, type **ovals** in the **Parameter** text box, and then click the **Show Help** button. 若要显示由关键字"来使用画笔绘制"帮助主题，请键入**mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm**中**关键字**文本框中，，然后单击**显示关键字**按钮。To show the "To paint with a brush" Help topic by the keyword, type **mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm** in the **Keyword** text box, and then click the **Show Keyword** button. 此示例显示了仅调用方法。This example shows only the call to the method. 请参阅完整的代码示例的类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CPP/helpsnippet.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/CS/helpsnippet.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Help#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Help/VB/helpsnippet.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `url`参数可以采用以下形式*C:\path\sample.chm*或 */folder/file.htm*。The `url` argument can be of the form *C:\path\sample.chm* or */folder/file.htm*. 路径的格式的信息，请参阅[文件在 Windows 系统上的路径格式](~/docs/standard/io/file-path-formats.md)。For information on the format of paths, see [File path formats on Windows systems](~/docs/standard/io/file-path-formats.md). 已编译的帮助文件提供的内容、 索引、 搜索和页面中的关键字链接表。Compiled Help files provide table of contents, index, search, and keyword links in pages. 可以使用以下值：`navigator`参数： ， ， ，或。You can use the following values for the `navigator` argument: , , , or . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法打开到其索引页面的帮助文件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to open a Help file to its index page. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为的按钮的窗体`Button2`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a button named `Button2`. summary.span: 显示位于用户提供的 URL 处的帮助文件内容。

span.span: Displays the contents of the Help file located at the URL supplied by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `url`参数可以采用以下形式*C:\path\sample.chm*或 */folder/file.htm*。The `url` argument can be of the form *C:\path\sample.chm* or */folder/file.htm*. 路径的格式的信息，请参阅[文件在 Windows 系统上的路径格式](~/docs/standard/io/file-path-formats.md)。For information on the format of paths, see [File path formats on Windows systems](~/docs/standard/io/file-path-formats.md). 已编译的帮助文件提供了页面中的表的内容、 索引、 搜索和关键字链接。Compiled Help files provide table-of-contents, index, search, and keyword links in pages. 可以使用`parameter`参数，以提供额外的优化， ， ，或命令。You can use the `parameter` argument to provide additional refinement of the , , , or command. 如果在指定的值`command`自变量是， ，或，此值应为空字符串 (""，或)。If the value specified in the `command` argument is , , or , this value should be an empty string ("", or ). 如果`command`自变量引用， ， ，或，此值应为包含主题名称或要显示的主题的关键字或数值标识符的字符串。If the `command` argument references , , , or , this value should be a string that contains the topic name, or the keyword or numeric identifier of the topic to display. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示具有可用于与 mspaint.chm 帮助文件进行交互的三个按钮的窗体。The following code example displays a form with three buttons that can be used to interact with the mspaint.chm Help file. **显示帮助索引**按钮将显示**索引**帮助文件的选项卡。The **Show Help Index** button displays the **Index** tab for the Help file. **显示帮助**按钮显示的帮助文件基于值中所选内容**帮助导航器**列表。The **Show Help** button displays content in the Help file based on the value that is selected in the **Help Navigator** list. **显示关键字**按钮显示的基于关键字的帮助文件中指定的内容**关键字**文本框。The **Show Keyword** button displays content in the Help file based on the keyword that is specified in the **Keyword** text box. 例如，若要显示由索引值的椭圆帮助页，选择中的值**帮助导航器**下拉列表中，键入**椭圆**中**参数**文本框中，，然后单击**显示帮助**按钮。For example, to show the Ovals Help page by the index value, select the value in the **Help Navigator** drop-down list, type **ovals** in the **Parameter** text box, and then click the **Show Help** button. 若要显示由关键字"来使用画笔绘制"帮助主题，请键入**mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm**中**关键字**文本框中，，然后单击**显示关键字**按钮。To show the "To paint with a brush" Help topic by the keyword, type **mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm** in the **Keyword** text box, and then click the **Show Keyword** button. 此示例显示了仅调用方法。This example shows only the call to the method. 请参阅完整的代码示例的类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. summary.span: 显示一个“帮助”弹出窗口。

span.span: Displays a Help pop-up window.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用具有事件类，以显示给用户的弹出样式帮助。The following code example uses the event with the class to display pop-up style help to the user. [!code-cpp[Control.KeyUp#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyUp/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.KeyUp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyUp/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.KeyUp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyUp/VB/form1.vb#1)]
